settings.title: Partner With Dr. Woof. Earn Commission. Make an Impact
settings.text:
Join our affiliate program and promote the medical apparel loved by healthcare workers across Australia and beyond — from premium compression socks to scrubs and more.

How It Works

  1. Apply: Fill out our quick affiliate application.

  2. Approval: We review each application to ensure new partners share our values of making the medical world smile.

  3. Promote: Once approved, you’ll get your unique links and access to content.

  4. Earn: Share Dr. Woof with your community and get paid for every sale.
